mainSequence.step: User clicks on the garbage bin under "financial goal" which is only visible to the owner.
User enters the amount to delete the financial goal.
GUI sends a request to the server to delete the financial goal with the specified ID.
Server sends a request to the database to delete the financial goal with the specified ID.
Database deletes the financial goal with the specified ID and returns the updated financial account data to the server.
Server returns the updated financial account data to the GUI.
GUI displays the updated financial account details to the user.
